channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Should Investors Do if Insurance Prices Keep Rising?
item.description: We’re currently in a home insurance crisis. Everyone (except for Henry, apparently) is feeling the sting of home insurance prices rising significantly year after year. Some investors have seen their […]

item.title: WeRide preps for an IPO, meet the man who built a startup pipeline at CNH and Waymo’s nightly honk-a-thon
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation. Sign up here for free — just click TechCrunch Mobility! We brought you a Tesla Dojo explainer last week. Now we’re giving you a handy Dojo timeline that tracks the progress of Tesla’s AI supercomputer. The timeline […] © 2024 TechCrunch. item.title: How the 1968 DNC in Chicago Devolved into ‘Unrestrained and Indiscriminate Police Violence’
item.description: As protesters prepare for the Democratic National Convention in Chicago next week, a half-century old report provides lessons for preventing chaos.

item.title: What Causes You to Wake Up in the Middle of the Night?
item.description: Are you often awake at night and struggling to fall back asleep? Discover what's waking you up and get tips to help you sleep through the night.

item.title: It’s Never Too Early (or Late) to Build a Team of Deal Finders. Here’s How To.
item.description: Deal finding is one of the most important parts of real estate investing, yet a lot of investors struggle to put it together. Here's how you can form a stellar team of finders.

item.title: Meta’s X rival Threads gains multiple drafts, audience insights and more
item.description: Meta’s X rival Threads announced a number of new features today, including the ability to store multiple drafts, a way to rearrange columns on the desktop, and insights into the user’s audience. Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg also mentioned that the company plans to add a post-scheduling feature soon. The company noted that these new features […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Aaron Sankin is The Marshall Project’s new Deputy Data Editor
item.description: Sankin brings deep experience with ambitious data projects.

item.title: What to Eat If You Have Prediabetes
With Mortgage Rates Falling, When Should Investors Refinance?
item.description: Mortgage rates have started to fall ever since the Fed announced that a rate drop could come as soon as September. When is the best time to refinance?

item.title: Geekbench releases AI benchmarking app
item.description: It’s a successor to Geekbench ML. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: ‘Deliberate Indifference’: Court Rulings Challenge Extreme Heat Conditions in Prisons
item.description: “If it’s 103 outside, it may be 107 to -8 inside of your cell,” said a man who worked in the fields while imprisoned in Texas.

item.title: Ways to Exercise If You Don't Enjoy Working Out

item.description: Anyone can get into real estate investing. Seriously, anyone! With today’s high interest rates, it may be more difficult to find a rental property that cash flows, but even if […]

item.title: Franki’s app rewards you for posting video reviews of local restaurants
item.description: Franki is a social discovery and video-based review app where users can interact with a community of foodies, discover local dining spots, and create their own videos showing off their favorite restaurants. Franki recently underwent a brand refresh, which included the introduction of a new “Social Club” rewards program. This program rewards creators for posting […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Tim Walz on Criminal Justice: 5 Things to Know
item.description: Where Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, Vice President Kamala Harris’ running mate, stands on policing, guns, prison reform and other issues.

item.title: How to Retire Early with Fewer Rental Properties Than You Think
item.description: You want to retire early, so you come up with a plan. “I’m going to buy ten rental properties and call it quits, then I’ll never have to work again.” […]

item.title: Announcing judges for the Startup Battlefield at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description: The Startup Battlefield is one of the highlights of Disrupt, and we can’t wait to see which of the thousands of applicants will be selected to pitch to panels of top-tier VCs at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024, taking place on October 28–30 in San Francisco. It’s always epic, and every contender is on the road to making a […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: They Exposed Police Misconduct. Now They’re Paying a Steep Price.
item.description: Whistleblower laws have advanced in public and private sectors, but protections for police who report illegal or unethical behavior lag far behind.
